*Protoporphyria XLPP is a variant of erythropoietic protoporphyria.",NIDDK,Porphyria
How many people are affected by Porphyria ?,"The exact rates of porphyria are unknown and vary around the world. For example, porphyria cutanea tarda is most common in the United States, and variegate porphyria is most common in South America.1",NIDDK,Porphyria
What causes Porphyria ?,"Most porphyrias are inherited disorders. Scientists have identified genes for all eight enzymes in the heme biosynthetic pathw
